ABOUT THIS GAME

Farming Simulator 2015 - this is just another addition to the series of simulators farmer. Due to the new graphics and physics engine , and an open game world filled with lots of details and visual effects , the game brings the franchise to a new level . Manage your farm , from harvesting to livestock , from the sale of fresh products to felling . Income from these activities will allow you to develop and invest in more powerful vehicles and tools.

Farming Simulator 15 is waiting for each of you in a whole new world , where there is a farm atmosphere, world livestock : chickens, sheep , cows , including culture and various sales. Process control with the development of his farm is happening in other infrastructure , which is shared by two great world.

FEATURES

Farming Simulator 2015 is a toy that is perfect for those people who are ready to achieve their own goals leisurely pace. The main reason for all this is its dynamism. Here, time does not run very fast, as it happens in other games. You must learn to put forces , as well as expected kickback . All this also applies to the very transport because of its slowness , including the process of ripening that occurs more than one day . It requires meticulous care .

In general , you understand exactly what you are encouraged not just another toy, in which everything is quite simple if in a fairy tale . You will have to seriously work hard in order to see their personal good results. The purpose of this game - make your own farm thrive. You will plant a field , cultivating various farm animals . Work for their own , so to speak , of prosperity.
